SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STOCK_ORDER_TEMP_T WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.APPR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPR_DT , A.APPR_NO, A.APPR_STAT , F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_NAME, F.FRN_OWNER FROM APPROVAL_T A INNER JOIN ORDER_T O ON A.APPR_NO = O.APPR_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN FRANCHISE_T F ON E.FRN_NO = F.FRN_NO WHERE 1=1
AND F.FRN_NO = #{frnNo}
AND A.APPR_STAT = #{apprStat}
AND ( F.FRN_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY
F.FRN_NAME A.APPR_DT
ASC DESC
